snippet.title: banksy89/Mini-Templater
snippet.description:
This is a little templating class I am creating, that handles Foreach loops within the views - so no PHP is inside views whatsoever. Then I can plug it into the Framework

snippet.title: alexgisby/Megarray
snippet.description:
A PHP class which aims to add some advanced abilities to arrays in PHP. Use Selectors to grab the elements you want from the array without pesky foreach loops!
Last updated October 04, 2010

snippet.title: eidryanDM/simple-arrays-in-php
snippet.description:
>Untitled Document</title> </head> <body> <?php $coffee = array("starbucks", "figaro", "seattles best"); $coffee_places = array ("a" => "starbucks", "b" => "figaro"); $preferred = $coffee[1]; echo $preferred; $prefer = $coffee_places ["b"]; echo $prefer
